page.title: 12Events in Mowsley & Laughton
page.content: Events that take place in both villages are{jumble-sales,}items being sold very cheaply, often one sees the same items yearly;this years bargain being next years rummage! Garden fetes are held annually in both villages at the now privately-owned Old Rectories. For several years the school has entertained the villagers to coffee & mince-pies made by the children,as a gesture of thanks for support through the year.A Pancake Party is held each Shrove Tuesday at Laughton House.Barn- {dances}are popular & discos with the teenagers. Coffee mornings are the fashionable fund-raisers,the{funds}raised from these{events}support village hall, school or church; this year however a lot of money went to the Ethopian Famine Relief Fund.
